name: Shrimp Pasta Primavera
ingredients: 1 Tbsp each basil, oregano, thyme and parsley
instructions: Meanwhile, sauté shrimp, asparagus and garlic in oil for 3-4 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
Add mushrooms, broth, tomato, salt and pepper flakes; simmer, uncovered for 2 minutes.
Add pasta and seasonings to skillet; toss to coat; sprinkle with cheese.
